column1: #Text=Zuko says : " The only thing I saw was a snowstorm heading our way . "
#Text=Tonraq says : " That 's not a snowstorm , it 's him ! "
#Text=Tonraq says : " I put you away once , Zaheer , and I 'm going to do it again ! "
#Text=Ming - Hua says : " Let 's get you out of here . "
#Text=P'Li says : " We could have just taken the elevator .
